definitions.definition: A person's forties are the period in which they are aged between 40 and 49:
examples: She's probably in her early forties.

definitions.definition: the range of temperature between 40° and 49°:
examples: The temperature is expected to be in the forties tomorrow.

definitions.definition: the decade (= period of ten years) between 40 and 49 in any century, usually 1940–1949:
examples: Our house was built some time in the forties.
